Virginia Robotics Symposium


November 7th, 2025

Link Lab
Charlottesville, VA

About

The Virginia Robotics Symposium (VRS) aims to bring together Virginia robotics researchers. VRS is a one-day event with research talks, poster presentations, and social activities. The goal of VRS is to share exciting ideas and build new connections in the robotics research community across the Commonwealth.

Registration

Attendance is free. Click here to register!

Participants

Program

VRS will be held as a one-day event with keynote talks, spotlight talks, poster presentations, and social activities.

Venue

The 2025 symposium will be held at the Link Lab: University of Virginia, Olsson Hall, Charlottesville, VA 22903.

Contact

For more information, please contact Dylan Losey (losey@vt.edu), Nicola Bezzo (nbezzo@virginia.edu), or Xuesu Xiao (xiao@gmu.edu).
